quotes.quote: A good-bye is never painful unless you're never going to say hello again.
Happy trails to you, until we meet again. Some trails are happy ones, others are blue. It's the way you ride the trail that counts, here's a happy one for you.
But fate ordains that dearest friends must part.
Painful though parting be, I bow to you as I see you off to distant clouds.
Don't be dismayed at goodbyes. A farewell is necessary before you can meet again. And meeting again, after moments or lifetime, is certain for those who are friends.
Man's feelings are always purest and most glowing in the hour of meeting and of farewell.
Odd how much it hurts when a friend moves away- and leaves behind only silence.
Sometimes your friends are your lovers,or have been at one time
Be well, do good work, and keep in touch.
Some people come into our lives and quickly go. Some stay for a while, leave footprints on our hearts, and we are never, ever the same.
Ever has it been that love knows not its own depth until the hour of separation.
We leave something of ourselves behind when we leave a place, we stay there, even though we go away. And there are things in us that we can find again only by going back there.
Never look back; you may only find what you left or let you go.
It may be that the satisfaction I need depends on my going away, so that when I've gone and come back, I'll find it at home.
I am going away with him to an unknown country where I shall have no past and no name, and where I shall be born again with a new face and an untried heart.
Sweet is the memory of distant friends! Like the mellow rays of the departing sun, it falls tenderly, yet sadly, on the heart.
Time is a circus, always packing up and moving away.
Its funny how people think moving away will make their life trouble and drama free.
It is amazing how nice people are to you when they know you're going away.
A house that does not have one worn, comfy chair in it is soulless.
A man builds a fine house; and now he has a master, and a task for life: he is to furnish, watch, show it, and keep it in repair, the rest of his days.
The light is what guides you home, the warmth is what keeps you there.
I long, as does every human being, to be at home wherever I find myself.
There's nothing half so pleasant as coming home again.
I am going awaywith him to an unknown country where I shall have no past and no name, and where I shall be born again with a new face and an untried heart.
I like working intensely, then going away and thinking about it, working out why it didn't work and then coming back to it. It makes the work richer, I think.
It may be that the satisfaction I need depends on my going away, so that when I've gone and come back, I'll find it at home.
There is a kind of magicness about going far away and then coming back all changed.
Never say goodbye because goodbye means going away and going away means forgetting.
Saying goodbye doesn't mean anything. It's the time we spent together that matters, not how we left it.
